articles.title: China coking coal, coke futures leap amid supply crunch - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese coking coal and coke futures jumped more than 4% on Tuesday, fuelled by concerns of tight supply amid Beijing's toughening emissions standards, although demand for the steelmaking ingredients remained tepid as mills cut production.

articles.title: China energy crunch triggers alarm, pleas for more coal - Reuters
